A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I now understand why Mark Hamill was so vocal about his character. He said\, he completely disagreed with Rian’s direction he took with Luke Skywalker and so do I. It’s clear Rian Johnson didn’t care at all about the direction JJ Abraham’s set up in Force Awakens. It feels like he knew nothing of the Star Wars story at all. He just did his own thing and in my opinion failed completely. Very disappointed in how they made Luke’s character seem like he cared about nothing and just wanted to die? Lazy writing as a whole with this film.
